description:
Join us for a night of cathartic musical exploration! Co-founder of DeSci London, Alfred, will be bringing his long, luxurious blends of deep techno, hypnotic acid, electro and drum & bass to Zuzalu. 

Get lost in the ethereal quality of the music, where the spectral sheen of each track interacts with the others to create something greater than the sum of its parts. 

This is an event that will nourish your mind, body, and soul. Join us for a night of interdependence and collaboration, where we come together to create the city we'd love to live in. 

If you're happy you live longer
